entries.name: Expanded Spell List
entries: The Faceless patron lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

subclassFeature.name: Mask of the Faceless
entries: Your senses have been taken along with your face, but the mask you were given in exchange can sense things as you once did. You have a telepathic link with this mask, and it continuously relays its senses to you. If this mask is ever separated from you you may spend a bonus action conjuring it to your face. Should this mask be planeshifted apart from you it will immediately return to your face instead of going to any other destination.
While wearing this mask you can cast {@spell disguise self} at will, without expending a spell slot. If this mask is taken off while the spell is in effect it will immediately end.

subclassFeature.name: Touched by the Void
entries: Starting at 1st level, you can choose one damage type when you finish a short or long rest. You gain resistance to that damage type until you choose a different one with this feature. Damage from magical weapons or silver weapons ignores this resistance.

subclassFeature.name: Enhanced Mask
entries: Starting at 6th level, you can spend an action to alter your body as a {@race changeling} would. When you do this you may choose to have your mask meld with your new face or leave it separate.

subclassFeature.name: Deepening Void
entries: Starting at 10th level, you can spend a bonus action to magically transform yourself into a shadowy form. In this form, you have resistance to all damage.

You remain in this form for 1 minute. It ends early if you are {@condition incapacitated}, if you die, or if you dismiss it as a bonus action. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Eyes of the Void
entries: Starting at 14th level, gain {@sense truesight} out to a range of 120 feet.
